section.title: locQualityIssueEnabled
section.para: Localization Quality Issue Enabled - the locQualityIssueEnabled attribute is the [ITS] defined locQualityIssueEnabled attribute.
This is a flag to enable or disable a particular issue.
Value description: yes when issue enabled , no otherwise.

note.para: The attribute locQualityIssueEnabled set to no can be used for instance to disable false positives that were produced by an automated QA tool.

section.para: See the ITS Localization Issue Annotation for the normative usage description of this attribute when used inline; advanced Constraints follow from that normative usage description. See <locQualityIssue> for standoff usage Constraints.
